title: [Large-Scale] IMS Learning Design-Based Online Science Course Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in fundamental online learning tools
context.additional_context: Online science education course enabling real-time interaction in smartphone-based constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design one or more science lecture modules using IMS LD templates
Learners can conduct small-group discussions and experiment simulations using real-time video conferencing tools
Learners can complete summative assessments through evaluation tools optimized for mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
